title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project item is not.
EB: Either both Open Project and Close Project should be available or neither of them should be enabled.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Navigate to the Navigator.
3. Select both P1 and P2.
4. Observe the availability of the Open Project and Close Project menu items.
